chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
Y: Type
S: X -> Y -> Prop
R: X -> Y -> Prop

Goal:
(forall (x : X) (y : Y), R x y -> S x y) -> forall (l : list X) (m : list Y), Forall2 R l m -> Forall2 S l m

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Forall2 : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> Prop) -> list A -> list B -> Prop
In_list_in_map_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (l : list X) (f : forall x : X, In x l -> Y) (y : Y), In y (list_in_map l f) -> exists (x : X) (Hx : In x l), y = f x Hx
VectorDef.of_list : forall l : list ?A, VectorDef.t ?A (length l) where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type R : X -> Y -> Prop S : X -> Y -> Prop |- Type]
Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
Forall2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
In_perm : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l : list X), In x l -> exists m : list X, x :: m ~p l
list_in_map : forall (X Y : Type) (l : list X), (forall x : X, In x l -> Y) -> list Y
Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2
Forall2_app : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l1' l2' : list B), Forall2 R l1 l1' -> Forall2 R l2 l2' -> Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) (l1' ++ l2')
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
Permutation_ind_bis : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l')) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l'
ForallOrdPairs_In : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A), ForallOrdPairs R l -> forall x y : A, In x l -> In y l -> x = y \/ R x y \/ R y x
Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l' : list B), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2' : list B, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2'
In_t : forall X : Type, X -> list X -> Type
list_injective_inv : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (ll : list X), list_injective (x :: ll) -> ~ In x ll /\ list_injective ll
Exists_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> P0 (x :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Exists P l -> P0 l
Permutation_transp_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l l) -> (forall (x y : A) (l1 l2 : list A), P (l1 ++ y :: x :: l2) (l1 ++ x :: y :: l2)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation_transp l l' -> P l l' -> Permutation_transp l' l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, Permutation_transp l l0 -> P l l0
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
ARadd_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)
ARadd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
ARmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
ARdistr_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul y z))
ForallOrdPairs_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
Permutation_Forall2 : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l1' : list A) (l2 : list B), l1 ~p l1' -> Forall2 P l1 l2 -> exists l2' : list B, l2 ~p l2' /\ Forall2 P l1' l2'
Forall2_nil : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), Forall2 R nil nil
Forall2_refl : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), Forall2 R nil nil
Inductive clos_trans (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := t_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y | t_trans : forall y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x z Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_trans _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.t_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.t_trans _%type_scope
Inductive clos_refl_trans (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := rt_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y | rt_refl : Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x x | rt_trans : forall y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x z Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rt_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rt_refl _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rt_trans _%type_scope
Operators_Properties.clos_rt_t : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x y z : A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x z
remove : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> A -> list A -> list A
